ComicInfo.Title: Four On the Floor Part Four
ComicInfo.Summary:
"FOUR ON THE FLOOR" CONTINUES!
That purple monster from space is STILL wreaking havoc across the West Coast...
Even the combined efforts of the Hulk, Wolverine, and Silk can't stop it!
Time for the Ghost Rider to clean up their mess...
Guest-starring the AGENTS OF S.H.I.E.L.D.!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Felipe Smith | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Felipe Smith | 2 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Chris Robinson, Mark Paniccia
